title: Ticket #4939: Streaming I/O breaks (job lease) reconnect.
description: The StreamHandler class calls Disconnect() in ReconnectAll(); the former closes the syscall socket... which had just finished reconnecting and prompted the call to ReconnectAll(). This would be bad enough by itself, but since the Disconnect() call is immediately followed by an attempt to use the syscall socket, the starter excepts on reconnects when streaming i/o.
